argument.name: javascriptFilename
argument.description: A relative or absolute URL that specifies the JavaScript file to load.

argument.name: callback
argument.description: A function to call after the JavaScript file has loaded.

discussion.p: The *[js:{dialog.object}.loadJavascriptFile()]* method loads an external JavaScript file. You can specify an optional function to call when the file has finished loading. The *[js:callback]* function is typically used to initialize a library after it has been loaded or serially load another JavaScript file.
